EmailTemplate.subject: Expedition Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_Member_Name__c} ,
Please be informed that you have been assigned to expedition {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_Name__c} which is planned to leave {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_Port_Name__c} {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_Country__c} on {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_Start_Date__c}. The mission is expected to last until {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_End_Date__c}. Your role on the expedition will be {!Expedition_Member__c.Expedition_Role__c}.
Further information and objectives for the mission will be provided to you in the coming days.
Thanks, TurtleWave Management
